Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, Drexel and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 43rd, Drexel and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Cottage Grove.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55A 55th/Austin Temporary Reroute near Austin/56th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
